summary: Provides a command‑line tool that loads a NeMo hybrid automatic‑speech‑recognition model, extracts its CTC or RNNT sub‑network, and writes the extracted component as an independent .nemo model.
business_intent: Allows developers to isolate and reuse specific parts of a hybrid ASR model, simplifying deployment, fine‑tuning, or integration of CTC or RNNT components in downstream speech‑recognition applications.
